insert into t_course (subject, time, goal, content, mode, isHomework, specificTime) values
(#{item.subject}, #{item.time},#{item.goal}, #{item.content}, #{item.mode}, #{item.isHomework}, #{item.specificTime} )

insert into t_course (id, goal, content, mode, isHomework, specificTime) VALUES
(#{id},#{item.goal}, #{item.content},#{item.mode}, #{item.isHomework}, #{item.specificTime} )
on duplicate key update goal=values(goal), content=values(content), mode=values(mode), isHomework=values(isHomework), specificTime=values(specificTime)
